content: उपजप् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To whisper into the ears of (another), win over to one's party by secretly suggesting anything in the ear; अंगारवर्षं राजवधायोपजप्य <ls>Dk. 104</ls>; क्षत्तारं कुरुराजस्तु शनैः कर्णमुपाजपत् <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} (Hence) to instigate to rebellion or treachery, conspire with; उपजप्यानुपजपेत् <ls>Ms. 7. 197.</ls> {@--3@} To commit mischief.
